cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15)
project({{name}})
set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD 17)

find_package(SDL2 REQUIRED)
find_package(SDL2_ttf REQUIRED)

add_executable({{name}} main.cpp)

target_include_directories({{name}} PRIVATE ${SDL2_INCLUDE_DIRS} ${SDL2_TTF_INCLUDE_DIRS})
target_link_libraries({{name}} PRIVATE SDL2::SDL2 SDL2::SDL2main SDL2_ttf::SDL2_ttf)

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15)
project({{name}})
set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD 17)

find_package(Drogon REQUIRED)

add_executable({{name}} main.cpp)
target_link_libraries({{name}} PRIVATE Drogon::Drogon)
